name: MONSTER EXTERMINATION
description:
Monster Extermination is a 2D plat-former game and the objective of this game is simple KILL ALL THE MONSTERS.

Credits:
art:https://opengameart.org/content/platform-pixel-art-assets

This is my first ever gamejam game and if you like it, found a bug or have any suggestion then tell me about it in the comments.
